channel.title: Posts on Life Journal : Ishita Jain
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Life Journal : Ishita Jain

item.title: Introduction: Me and my journey
item.description: Greetings, everyone! I’m Ishita Jain, originally from India but proud to call Singapore my home for over a decade. By profession, I’m a Cyber Security engineer, but my personal passions extend to various forms of creativity, including crafting, cooking, and writing. My love for exploring new countries and cities with my family has allowed me to immerse myself in diverse cultures, traditions, people, and cuisines. At present, I’m on a journey of discovering different ways to embrace life fully.
